slogan: Empowering rural youth with digital education.
intro_description: Gyanoday is a lightweight, offline-first web application designed to deliver an inclusive and engaging educational experience to students in rural areas with limited internet connectivity. The platform integrates gamification, personalized learning paths, and a community hub to foster critical thinking and practical skill development.

module1.title: Core Learning Experience
module1.description: High-quality, culturally-relevant, and accessible content with offline access.

module2.title: Gamification & Progress Tracking
module2.description: Engaging learning with quests, badges, and virtual farms.

module3.title: Personalized Learning & AI-Powered Support
module3.description: Tailored learning paths and an 'Ask-a-Tutor' chatbot.
